fun..s animal: Displays an animal gif/photo from reddit
fun..s 8ball (question): Ask a question for it to be answered
fun..s rng (start number) (end number): Generates a random number between the user-defined limits

game..s fight (@user): **DISABLED** Starts a 'fight' with a tagged person

utility..s covid [country]: Displays covid-19 statistics for either the world or individual countries
utility..s serverinfo: Lists information about the current server
utility..s temp (number) (f or c): Converts a given fahrenheit or celsius amount to the other unit
utility..s weather (city): Prints current temperature and weather description of inputed city

roles..s createrole (role name) [color-code]: Creates a role in the guild. Color code must be in hex format without the # (i.e. 7289da) (Requires manage_roles permission)
roles..s resolverequest [@user] [role name]: **DISABLED** If no arguments are entered, deletes the next request in the list. If both arguments are entered, deletes that certain request (Requires `Manage Roles` permission)
roles..s deleterequest [role name]: Deletes the entered role request, if no name is entered, all your requests will be deleted
roles..s exportreqs: **DISABLED** Sends a dm to the user with a list of upcoming role requests
roles..s giverole (@user) (role name): Gives the user the inputed role (Requires `Manage Roles` permission)
roles..s removerole (@user) (role name): Removes the role from the user (Requires `Manage Roles` permission)
roles..s editrole (role name): Prompts to edit either the role's name or color (Requires `Manage Roles` permission)

misc..s help [category]: Displays a help guide for Sentinel
misc..s yoink: Retrieves the most recent deleted message and sends it
misc..s purge (number): Deletes x amount of messages in the text-channel (requires `Manage Message` permission)
misc..s reload (cog): Attempts to reload either all cogs or a certain cog (requires `Admin` permissions)

mod..s slowmode (seconds): Enables slowmode for the channel. Use 0 for seconds to disable slowmode
mod..s lock: Disables send_messages permissions for all non-admin users in the channel
mod..s unlock: Enables send_messages permissions for all non-admin users in the channel
mod..s unmute (@user): Unmutes a muted user (requires `Kick Members` permissons)
mod..s kick (@user) [reason]: Kicks user from the server (requires `Kick Members` permissons)
mod..s ban (@user) [reason]: Bans user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissons)
mod..s unban (username#tags): Unbans a banned user from the server (requires `Ban Members` permissions)

settings..s setwelcomemsg [message]: Sets the bot message for when someone joins the server. Type %s where you want the user to be mentioned, or leave message blank to se to default (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s enablewelcomemsg (True/False): Enables or disables the welcome message when someone joins server (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s welcomepicture [url]: Sets the welcome message picture/gif. Leave url blank to revert to default (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s setwelcomechannel (channel): Sets the channel that you want user join messages set to. (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s setleavemsg [message]: Sets the bot message for when someone leaves the server. Type %s where you want the user to be mentioned, or leave message blank to se to default (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s enableleavemsg (True/False): Enables or disables the leave message when someone leaves server (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s leavepicture [url]: Sets the leave message picture/gif. Leave url blank to revert to default (Requires `Manage Server` permission)
settings..s setleavechannel (channel): Sets the channel that you want user leave messages set to. (Requires `Manage Server` permission)

changeLog.1/31/21:
**Added Saveable Settings**
Added several settings for welcome/goodbye message, `.s help Settings` to see available commands
sAdded `.s rng`.
changeLog.1/29/21: Disabled `fetchreq`, `exportreq`, `rolereq`, `resolvereq`, and `deletereq` for now for fixing.
changeLog.1/20/21: Fixed unmuted message appearing when user was mannually unmuted
changeLog.1/15/21:
Added `.s rolerequest` and `.s deleterequest` for requesting rows, `.s fetchrequests` for displaying requests and `.s exportreqs` for sending request list
Changed `.s memcount` to `.s serverinfo`, now has more info about the server in general
Fixed `.s createrole` command giving wrong error if server reached role limit.
changeLog.1/13/21: **Added roles cog with several role commands (`.s help roles`).** Database will be integrated within the next couples days
changeLog.1/9/21:
Reworked how `.s help` works, made it more efficiently written and user-friendly
Entering just `.s` will now send a message to help begin
changeLog.1/6/21:
Added `.s animal`, `.s covid`
Added `.s lock`, `.s unlock`, `.s slowmode` for admins
changeLog.1/3/21:
Added `.s memcount`
Added a few insults to `.s insult`.
changeLog.12/27/20:
Added `.s meme`, `.s weather`
Added more info to help guide
Fixed invalid user ping when user leaves server
Fixed `.s temp` to round to the nearest hundreth
changeLog.12/26/20:
**Added Utility Commands cog**
*Current commands: temperature converter (`.s temp`)*
Modified Rock-Paper-Scissors to send embeds instead of messages.
Removed the word 'asshole' from member leaving message.
Fixed the Goodbye GIF sending to the wrong channel glitch
changeLog.12/16/20:
Added Rock-Paper-Scissors game (.s rps), .s eatburger, .s kill, .s 8ball, .s cointoss
Added .s warn for admins
Goodbye message will now try to send to a text channel with goodbye in the name (if exists). Added gifs to hello/bye messages
changeLog.12/14/20:
**Added admin cog, with several new commands**
Shifted change log into a json file for ease of edit
Not entering an argument for .s help defaults it to short
Updated `purge` command to not include command message, also sends message when completed
Added 2 aliases for 'insult' command
changeLog.12/13/20:
Added `changelog` command
Added role requirement for `reload` and `purge` commands
